media:group.media:title: Mexican Spanish vs. Spain Spanish

Some people worry about which kind of Spanish to learn, Mexican, Colombian, Argentinian, or the Spanish from Spain. In my view, this is not something worth worrying about when we start out in the language.Â Later on,Â once you are comfortable in the language,Â you can decide which accent or version you want to focus on.

0:00 Does it matter which you learn, Mexican Spanish vs. Spain Spanish?
1:40 It's not too difficult to understand the variations of Spanish: they aren't that different.
4:01 Don't focus in a certain kind of Spanish, focus on content of interest. 
7:42 Though there are many regional differences, Spanish is one language.
